SELECT t1.id apartmentId, t1.company_name companyName, t1.province province, t1.city city, t4.district district, t1.area area, t2.id houseId, t2.title title, t2.community_name communityName, t2.acreage acreage, t2.chaoxiang chaoxiang, t2.zhuangxiu zhuangxiu, t2.status status, t2.floor floor, t2.total_floor totalFloor, t2.hall hall, t2.room room, t2.wei wei, t2.rent_type rentType, t2.zujin_type zujinType, t2.rent_amt rentAmt, t2.list_time listTime, t2.delist_time delistTime, t2.page_view pageView, t4.latitude latitude, t4.longitude longitude, t4.street street, t4.detail_addr detailAddr, t2.created_time houseCreatedTime FROM t_zfang_apartment t1, t_zfang_house t2, t_zfang_house_location t4 WHERE t1.id = t2.apartment_id AND t2.id = t4.house_id AND t4.is_delete NOT IN ('01') AND t1.is_delete NOT IN ('01') AND t2.is_delete NOT IN ('01') AND t2.status = '2'
AND t1.id = #{apartmentId} AND t2.id = #{houseId} AND t2.id <> #{targetHouseId} AND t1.province = #{province} AND t1.city = #{city} AND t4.id = #{district} AND t2.rent_type = #{rentType} AND t2.rent_type = #{zujinType} AND t2.zhuangxiu = #{zhuangxiu} AND t2.status = #{status} AND t2.rent_amt >= #{minRentAmt} AND t2.rent_amt <= #{maxRentAmt} ORDER BY listTime DESC LIMIT #{sortField}

SELECT t1.id apartmentId, t1.company_name companyName, t1.province province, t1.city city, t4.district district, t1.area area, t2.id houseId, t2.title title, t2.community_name communityName, t2.acreage acreage, t2.chaoxiang chaoxiang, t2.zhuangxiu zhuangxiu, t2.status status, t2.floor floor, t2.total_floor totalFloor, t2.hall hall, t2.room room, t2.wei wei, t2.rent_type rentType, t2.zujin_type zujinType, t2.rent_amt rentAmt, t2.list_time listTime, t2.delist_time delistTime, t4.latitude latitude, t4.longitude longitude, t4.street street, t4.detail_addr detailAddr, t2.created_time houseCreatedTime FROM t_zfang_apartment t1, t_zfang_house t2 LEFT JOIN t_zfang_house_location t4 ON t4.house_id = t2.id AND t4.is_delete NOT IN ('01') WHERE t1.id = t2.apartment_id AND t1.is_delete NOT IN ('01') AND t2.is_delete NOT IN ('01') AND t2.list_time < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ()
AND t2.id = #{houseId} LIMIT 1
